summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department, providing for construction of a sanitary sewer system in an area generally located north of Discovery Park between 47th Avenue West and the Bay Terrace Addition (Lawton Wood Sanitary Sewer Project), authorizing hiring of consultants and the awarding of contracts, increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1980 Budget of the Engineering Department and making a reimbursable appropriation therefor.
